Welcome Message.subHeading: The welcome message will greet your customers when they initiate a new conversation

Away Message.subHeading: The away message will be shown to your users if and when they open an existing conversation or initiate a new one when when entire team is away or offline.

Quick Replies.subHeading: Press / before typing the shortcut term during a conversation to get the full message

Email Notifications.subHeading: We will send you email notifications if you are offline/away for more than 5 minutes and you have unread messages.

Teammates.subHeading: See the list of all the team members, their roles, add new team members and edit member details.

Conversation Rules.subHeading: Set up the way conversations are assigned to and handled by your agents and bots.

Mailbox.subHeading: Connect your support email to manage, send and receive support emails from Kommunicate.

Install.subHeading: Follow the steps below to install Kommunicate Chat in your product.

Push Notifications.subHeading: Enabling push notification allows Kommunicate to send notifications even when your mobile app is not in the foreground.

Chat Widget.subHeading: Stylize the chat widget according to your brand colors

Fallback Emails.subHeading: We send fallback emails to your users and/or your team members if they miss any new messages.

Webhooks and Security.subHeading: Setting up the webhook URLs of your APIs here will allow us to notify your server for messages and send copies of these messages. Configuring the security settings will add a layer of authentication.

CSAT Ratings.subHeading: Measure how satisfied your users are with your customer support

Customization.subHeading: Change the look and feel of your helpcenter

Auto-resolve conversations.subHeading: Set up rules to automatically resolve conversations

Content.subHeading: FAQs help customers find answers faster through self service, and also reduce workload of your team
